component.text:
Activity - Identify the VLAN Attack Types, Attack Mitigation Techniques, and Security Features

Drag the VLAN attack type, attack mitigation technique, or security feature to its corresponding description. Not all terms will be used.
A user is attacking other user PCs in a coffee shop environment. User PCs still need to be granted access to the Internet and print server.
Disable DTP on all ports, and statically assign ports as Access or Trunk.
Ensure that the native VLAN of trunk ports are distinct from access port VLANs.
You have successfully matched each description with its VLAN attack type, attack mitigation technique, or security feature.
You have not successfully matched each description with its VLAN attack type, attack mitigation technique, or security feature.
